long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more losing progress on forms.

You don't need the Formkeepr Extension until one day, you do. Have you ever spent hours filling out some tedious form, only for your computer to die, or for the page to crash?

Enter Formkeepr - with Formkeepr, all you would need to do is refresh the page or plug in your computer and pick up right where you left off.

üí∞ COMPLETELY FREE üí∞
Formkeepr is 100% free. Just add it to Chrome, make an account, and enjoy. No more monthly bills.

üîí PRIVACY üîí
Formkeepr has NO access to your inputs. Everything is saved locally on your computer. Along with that, we do not sensitive info like passwords and credit cards.

‚å®Ô∏è CONTROL ‚å®Ô∏è
Disable Formkeepr at any time - either for a specific site, or for all sites.

üß† STAY INFORMED üß†
When Formkeepr autosaves your inputs, it shows a small notification in the top-right corner.
